text: Ara tadera kache jnana asara para sudhu parasparika bidbesabasata [1] tara nijedera madhye matabheda ghataya. Ara eka nirdharita kala paryanta abakasa samparke apanara rabera purba sid'dhanta na thakale tadera bisaya phayasala haye yeta. Ara tadera para yara kitabera uttaradhikari hayeche, niscaya tara se samparke bibhraantikara sandehe rayeche
